entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 02:47 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -40.9°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -45.1°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
